iskcon-hubli-dharwad-ekadashi.details: Observing Ashadi Ekadashii, also known as Devshayani Ekadashi, purifies the heart and mind, drawing us closer to Lord Vitthal's divine grace.  It is a day when devotees fast, perform harinama sankirtana and offer seva to Lord Krishna. Offer your humble contribution on the revered occasion of Ekadashi and help the multiple initiatives of ISKCON Hubli-Dharwad. The various sevas offered on this divine occasion invite the divine grace of Lord Krishna to nurture, advance and prosper the society with immense happiness and fortune.
